title: Akatsuki no Fumi
description:
Collection of short stories.

[b]Contents:[/b]
[*][b]Akatsuki no Fumi[/b] (Daybreak Letters)
The year is 2435, and Takatsuki Minori has developed a machine that can transport historical figures from their original time to the present. His son, Akira, one day discovers that the machine has gone haywire for no reason and ends up accidentally summoning the 16th century samurai, Mori Ranmaru...
[*][b]Shinjitsu no Catharsis[/b] (The Catharsis of Truth)
[*][b]Moero! Otousan[/b]
[*][b]Rasen no Kioku[/b] (Spiral Memories)
Ever since tragedy struck his life, Chihiro Hirosaki has fallen into depression and longs for a way to end it all. When a young demon crashes into his life, seeking to take advantage of his arrival in the human world to form a life stealing contract, could it be that they've both found what they were looking for? 
[*][b]Asa to Yoru no Tenohira ni[/b]
[*][b]Kimi ni Okuru[/b]
[*][b]Hi no Matoi (pilot)[/b]

matches.title: Ano Ko ni Yasashii Sekai ga Ii
